title: 17-year-old boy shot in Chicago Lawn
content:
About 7:30 p.m., the boy was walking in the 6300 block of South Talman when someone in a gray vehicle drove up, got out and fired shots before hopping back in the vehicle that drove away, according to Chicago Police.
He was shot in the hip and taken to Christ Medical Center in Oak Lawn in good condition, police said.
